name: Monkey Ninja (itch)
description:
A terrible disease has struck ancient Egypt! Our hero, the Monkey Ninja sets on a journey to gather resources and find the precious cure...

Your goal in this jam version is to reach the final part of the level where you will fight to the death to get the best Diamond Score you can!

The contrasting elements we decided to implement as the “limitation”  factor was our use of cartoony art style contrasted by the splatter style effects on enemy deaths. We feel this gave the graphics an interesting twist!

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD / Arrow

Jump: Space

Attack: Return

Pause: Escape

CREDITS:

Art/Animations: Code 15

Music Theme composed/mixed: Code 15

All Scripts: Code 15

All assets and game made for the 72 hour “Ancient Egypt” mini-jam
